EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.SF ISV Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - San Francisco | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in San Francisco, CA.
We are very excited to be hosting this event. In the past, partners who have attended the event have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
What: Pivotal Partner Days: Software Integration Workshop When: November 8-9, 2017 Where: Pivotal San Francisco, 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103
Please review what you need to prepare and bring <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/san-francisco/software-integration-workshop#beforeyouarrive]]> prior to the event.
Questions? Please contact Marina Joseph, Technical Program Manager, ISV Engineering, Pivotal Cloud Foundry at mjoseph@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mjoseph@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
